short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read and write reviews for Amazon, Ebay, NewEgg, Aliexpress, Alibaba and any other web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reviews.chat is a tool that allows you to attach comments to any web page. This enables people to:

- read and write reviews about product from websites such as Amazon, Ebay, NewEgg and many more
- ask and answer questions about their next travel destinations in real time
- comment on news sites or even social media posts, without compromising their privacy
- leave their opinion about any page

Features:
- real time messages
- ability to sign up and build a profile
- get notified on your email when somebody replies to your message
- advanced protection against spam

How To Use:
1. Install the extension
2. Pin the Reviews.chat icon on the toolbar
3. Go to any page
4. Click the icon
5. Write the message inside the box
6. If you don't find a review for the product you want, don't worry, if somebody replies to that page you will also be notified as soon as possible on your email
